item.title: Self Introduce
item.description: I often got asked about “tell me about yourself” situation, I got awkward and don’t know where to start, so I was thinking why don’t I just have a dedicated page to tell a bit about myself, so here we go. Of course I’m biased, as my view conflicts with my own interest ðŸ˜ƒ. As I like tagging label, I know tag labels to others is not polite, but tagging myself I think it’s fine.
